thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Premier Louvre Saint Honore - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Awesome location and staff
thread.title_full: Awesome location and staff - Review of BEST WESTERN Premier Louvre Saint Honore, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: tknguyen2010
title: Awesome location and staff
text: Being a wheelchair user, it is difficult to find accommodating hotels in Paris that is accommodating in both staff and structure. Hassen the front desk manager made our stay incredible, from his delightful service to assisting us with navigation throughout the city. I highly recommend this hotel during a leisurely stay in Paris-perfect location to everything and even more perfect service. Thank you!
